import React from 'react' const QuoteCard = (props) => { const {quote} = props; console.log(quote) return (
{calculatePercentageOfVotes(quote .upvotesCount,quote .downvotesCount).toFixed(0)} %
{quote .upvotesCount} / {qoute.downvotesCount}

{qoute.content}

-{qoute.author}
) } export default QuoteCard
